types:type.name: name
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type name = Array<{| id: String, firstname: String, middlename: String, lastname: String, city: String, state: String, address: String, email: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":\\\"693cacff-147d-4b84-add8-dad773730508\\\",\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"piter\\\",\\\"middlename\\\":\\\"gg\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"gg\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"jj\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"New York\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"gg\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"ggh@hh.nn\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":\\\"589ddfcv-44dse-4b84-add8-dad773730508\\\",\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"Mike\\\",\\\"middlename\\\":\\\"Tom\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"cc\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"kk\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"Califo\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"oo\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"mikee@hh.nn\\\"}]"}
